table_of_contents.title: V3-6: Paul's joyful confidence in God because of their gospel partnership

V7-8: The ground of his confidence – the nature of the partnership God's
work has produced

V9-11: Paul's prayer that the love of Christ will equip believers to be ready
for his Day

Purpose: Praise God for the gospel of Jesus. It produces partnership through abounding, discerning 
love, preparing us for the Day of Christ.
Praise God for and rejoice in the gospel
Thank God for the partnership the gospel produces

Pray that, whatever our circumstances, we will love the Lord and pursue
what is most vital in our lives together so that we may be godly now and 
ready for Jesus' return

1. Rejoice! The gospel progresses through any and every circumstance
v12-18a

2. Rejoice! Our progress and salvation are sure as we partner in the gospel
of Jesus v18b-26

1. Rejoice! The gospel progresses through any and every circumstance
v12-18a

2. Rejoice! Our progress and salvation are sure as we partner in the gospel
of Jesus v18b-26

1:27-30 Live worthy of the gospel of Christ – rejoice in contending for it and 
sharing in suffering for Jesus

2:1-4 Live worthy of the gospel of Christ - as those who belong to him seek 
unity through humility

v5-11 Live worthy of the gospel of Christ - share his attitude, knowing that 
God has honoured him for it
1. Rejoice in contending for the gospel and sharing in suffering for Jesus
2. Share Jesus' mind by serving others

12-18 Work out your salvation to the end by uncomplainingly holding out
the word of life even to those who oppose you

19-30 Learn from the example of Timothy and Epaphroditus to seek Jesus'
interests by serving in the gospel and for the sake of others
Work out your salvation to the end …

…by uncomplainingly holding out the word of life even to those who 
oppose you…
…seek Jesus' interests by serving in the gospel and for the sake of others…
V1, Stay safe! Keep rejoicing in the Lord
V2-6: So don't rejoice in status or achievement

V7-11: Instead put these aside in order to know Jesus and share his life and
death
Rejoice in the Lord - don't rejoice in status or achievement

Rejoice in the Lord - grow in knowledge of Jesus as we share his life and 
death
V12-16, Press on to salvation – be united in thinking this way
Wait for salvation–don't live as enemies of the cross v17-21
This is how you stand firm in the Lord 4:1
Press on to salvation–be united in thinking this way
Wait for salvation–don't live as enemies of the cross
Stand firm thus in the Lord…with one mind contending v2-3
Stand firm thus in the Lord…trusting in the God of peace v4-9
Stand firm thus in the Lord…copying the model of Paul v10-13
Stand firm thus in the Lord…partnering in the gospel v14-23
